"Gunner": "Gunner is a class that has excellent aerial mobility and deals high damage at close and medium ranges."

"\"Chain Trigger\" is a skill that counts the number of times you land hits with Normal Attacks & uncharged PAs to deal a massive amount of damage with a Chain Finish.

A Chain begins when you hit with a charged PA. The Chain Count increases with each hit from your attacks, and your next charged PA becomes a Chain Finish."

"Chain Trigger is a very important Class Skill which can be enhanced with a number of other skills.
For example, \"Chain Boost\" grants you bonus effects, such as increased attack speed, based on your Chain Count when you land a Chain Finish."
